column2: "Hey, what are you up to, partner? Hm? You were asked to do something by that cat?"
"You really are something, aren't you? So, what did it ask you to do?"
"Hmm, it was asking about a cute girl? So, why are you coming to me?"
"Wait, a cute girl? What the hell?! I'm a guy!"
"Damn! If you see that cat again, let me know! Don't forget it!"
"Oh, nice timing, partner."
"There was something I wanted to give you. Here, take this."
"I won't use it, so it's better off in your hands."

"No need to thank me.
We're partners, right?"

"You're always looking out for me.
It's the least I could do! Haha!"
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Afin."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Afin."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Afin."
"Received \"One Point\" from Afin."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Afin."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Afin."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Afin."
"Received \"Homing Emission\" from Afin."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Afin."
"Received \"Synthesizer\" from Afin."
"Received \"<%skit_text>\" from Afin."
"Wow, this place is huge! Quite a difference from where I lived before. Well, that place was big too, though."
"There were a lot of Darkers at the start, but somehow we made it through. We must be super lucky! Haha."
"I was pretty distracted, but I somehow managed to push forward. "
"Even after becoming an ARKS, life still goes on. I thought things would have been stricter."
"Since you're still inexperienced, the amount of planets you can go to are limited. "
"If you want to go to more planets, then work hard to be recognized. The road ahead is a long one."
"Even though ARKS have a high standing, that doesn't mean they can do whatever they want."
"There have been times when some outrageous actions have been overlooked, though. ...Unofficially."
"It's so nice here. I want to relax all the time. But as soon as there's a mission, I have to leave..."
"There are so many skills. It's hard to remember them all, isn't it?"
"But if you can remember them, they can be really useful. Let's keep it up!"
"Hmmm. I don't have any good weapons. I wonder if there are some new ones I could get..."
"The goal is to find people, so only carry light weapons!"
"...Even if you say that, you still got mad and fought seriously. I didn't mean to come off as unfaithful."
"We can change classes, but the higher ranks have already chosen theirs. Why did it change...?"
"There are some ARKS that are not only good at fighting, but also at gathering info. I wonder if I'm the same..."
"I knew finding people would be hard, but this will take a while. Guess I'll just have to be patient."
"More Darkers appeared! At least that's what it feels like a lot these days. Maybe it's just me?"
"Seeing you complete so many Client Orders is making me happy, too. Hehe."
"I was told by my superiors that \"you don't have any courage, but you know that\". A bit harsh, don't you think?"
"The thing that's scary is that there are people who think they have courage when they don't. ...Guess they're just reckless."
"I've been thinking. The Darkers have been our enemies for a while now, but it hasn't been properly been recorded in history..."
"ARKS are... loved by everyone. But I never thought it would be this tiring... ha."
"The best ARKS... the Council of Six? I guess. They're all pretty strong."
"I was just on a walk. Weren't you just here?"
"It's weird how the ARKS ship can be attacked directly and no one panics. I guess it happens too often for people to get upset."
"...I feel like there's something wrong with you if you think that that's normal."
"I didn't join ARKS because I wanted to protect someone."
"Like, I thought if we get attacked here... I end up thinking I want to protect everyone. It's weird to think about."
"Ever since the Dark Falz's revival, everyone's been on edge."
"Well, I might be stating the obvious, but it's no use feeling down about it."

"ウワサの暴走龍ってさ
なんか結構数いるみたいだな。"
"There are some super-strong people out there, so be careful."
"Well, I think it's good to let off a little steam in the ARKS Battle Tournament every once in a while."
"Looks like a lot of people are joining in... what should I do?"
"...Ah, my bad, partner. I was spacing out."
"I know I can't solve anything just by thinking about it... but I'm bad at acting on my thoughts."
"...Ah, my bad, partner. I was spacing out."
"I know I can't solve anything just by thinking about it... but I'm bad at acting on my thoughts."
"The Quarry on Planet Lillipa... I feel like there's something there."
"Ah, it's not really a \"get rich quick\" thing. That gets old pretty fast. "
"This... seems like a joke. My sister that I was separated from is Dark Falz... what's happening?"
"If that's the case, then I should just stop suffering..."
"...No. If you're going to keep living, then things will work out. I'm sure everything will be fine."
"This... seems like a joke. My sister that I was separated from is Dark Falz... what's happening?"
"If that's the case, then I should just stop suffering..."
"...No. If you're going to keep living, then things will work out. I'm sure everything will be fine."
"...Partner. That turned out to be amazing."
"You really seem to get caught up in everything. ...I feel sorry for you. It must be tough."
"Hey, partner. So much has changed since we became ARKS, hasn't it?"
"Things are changing everywhere... I'll try my best to adapt."
"You're always so positive. We have the power to change things, so I won't give up!"
"If only I could keep pushing forward constantly. It's so hard..."
"You seem as busy as ever. Me? Still no trace of my sister to be found."
"We investigated around the mining base, but I think we'll have to switch up our methods."
"Watching you makes me want to do my best, too!"
"It sounds like there has been a lot of sightings of my sister around the mining base."
"You didn't give up no matter what. I just need to push forward like you and find my sister!"
"Partner, thanks for everything. Thanks to you, I was able to meet my sister. "
"But there is still a lot for me to think about."
"We've come this far. I won't give up now."
"Hey, partner. Looks like you've been through a lot. I'm glad you're okay though."
"What about me? It's the same old with my sister. She runs at the sight of me."
"But, I won't give up. I finally got to meet her after all."
"Are you okay, partner? When they told me you were taking a break, I got worried."
"Your ego's pretty big, but I think you should rely on those around you a little more."
"Don't work too hard. If you need anything, just ask!"
"Since I always see you do your best, I want to try my best at doing things too!"
"Even though it's hard to bear when someone so close to you becomes Dark Falz... in the end we just can't give up."
"I can help out too! I'm confident, we won't fail!"
"Yo, partner. Nice work out there."
"I think it's important to have a partner by your side that you look up to."
"Anyways, I'm glad things turned out like you wanted. I'm happy for you."
"My bad. I didn't know what to do. I just knew I had to call you."
"I don't know, either. It just suddenly sprang out of Yucreta in front of me!"
"She said she didn't know what it was, either! Gimme a break here..."
"That's pretty serious. The Apprentice's sealed power getting out..."
"They say that there is some meaning to the timing of the Aurora but honestly I don't have any clue what it is."
"Well..thanks, partner. If it were me, I would have lost it back there."
"Oh, partner! Hehe, it's been a while since we've been together! "
"What does it feel like to sleep for two years? I guess you wouldn't really know since you were asleep. It felt like a long time out here, though."
"I'm glad I could see you again after so long, though!"
"Partner! You look as busy as ever. If you want a break, just call me anytime!"
"It was only a moment for you, but for me it was two years. I want to go on missions with you sometimes."
"Yucreta and I are going to become a part of the ARKS General Affairs Department. Under Maria. That's right."
"Sara has been doing well, so we haven't had many problems. But it seems like the Intelligence Department has it rough sometimes."
"The General Affairs Department is pretty big, so I made a lot of new connections."
"It's nice. I can talk with people I haven't talked to before and ask about you."
"Since there are so many people to meet, I think Yucreta has started to get used to it here. "
"Hey, partner. You got some time?"
"Somehow things have gotten serious again, haven't they?"
"Well, I think you'll be fine. But, if you need anything, call me."
"Of course, refining a lot of plans with people will make things harder when more people work on it. "
"Its hard being pushed down by large Darker-like numbers, but making as many plans to take care of them is also annoying."
"I wish that, instead of fighting, talking and resolving things was how we did things..."
"Hey, thanks. For what? That last fight, of course. You took care of it for me."
"We were so powerless, we could only evacuate... that's not good."
"...But, from now on, we need to be prepared to release the limiter if and when this happens again."
"So, about Aru, the past Dark Falz. I was asking him about his experience and comparing it to Yucreta's."
"That Darker didn't give off any weird energy at all. I didn't even notice him. I wonder if that's why."
"Ardem, who stole Mother's power, was talking about the world's remaking and some other things. "
"I don't know what he's thinking, remaking the world. There shouldn't be enough Ether to do that."
"I wonder if the intention is to remake the world like making Phantoms... just thinking out loud."
"Are we talking about remaking the world to change the current one? ...That sounds oddly doable."
"Was it because Mother's power was drained? But isn't the source the ARKS Photoners?"
"I feel like the moving around is our responsibility somehow. Maybe we should do something about that?"
"To bring down a god is... well... wow. Amazing is the only thing I can say."
"But Photoners can mess up too. Guess that's just the price of growth."
"About time. Or, should I say... finally."
"This always makes me so stressed. But I don't know what to do about it..."
"Anyways, we support you partner! We'll do whatever we can!"
"Hey, partner! Welcome back!"
"Got a message from Xiao saying she was okay. I knew they would be, but still. Thank goodness."
"Since there haven't been many missions lately, everyone's seemed to have calmed down a little."
"...But, partner? There is something different about you today. You look a little rough."
"I wonder if it's something I can help with... but, judging by your face, I don't think I can."
"I don't know what to say other than for you to do your best! I'll help you when I can!"
"Aurora and Yucreta just disappeared!"
"A symbol appeared beneath their feet and the next thing I know... \"Poof!\" They were gone without a trace!"
"I can't find them anywhere. What the hell is going on here?"
"Partner! Yucreta is back home! Safe and sound."
"Yucreta didn't give me any details, but it was all thanks to you, right? Thank you so much!"
"Yuki and Aurora get a lot of calls from the Intelligence Division."
"They don't have any information about the Goddess of Demise, so they want to ask Aurora, since she knows a lot about the past."
"Client Orders"

"As you progress through the game, your character may get requests on occasion. These are called \"Client Orders\".

The nature of the clients requests vary, and may involve things like taking instructions to clear a certain quest or being asked to gather certain items.

If a character has Client Orders available, a blue icon appears above their head."

"In the case of defeating enemies and gathering their items, if you have not received a client order to do so, they will not drop their items.

Make sure to inform the individual once the objective have been achieved. You can receive an expression of gratitude.

Once you've progressed further in the game, you can try to talk to other characters. You might be able to get new client orders."

"As you progress through the game, your character may get requests on occasion. These are called \"Client Orders\".

The nature of the clients requests vary, and may involve things like taking instructions to clear a certain quest or being asked to gather certain items.

If a character has Client Orders available, a blue icon appears above their head."

"In the case of defeating enemies and gathering their items, if you have not received a client order to do so, they will not drop their items.

Make sure to inform the individual once the objective have been achieved. You can receive an expression of gratitude.

Once you've progressed further in the game, you can try to talk to other characters. You might be able to get new client orders."

"お、さっそく来てくれたんだ。
やっぱり、持つべきは良い相棒だよな。
てなわけで、ちょっと話聞いてくれよ。"
"アフィンをパートナーとして呼べるようになりました。"

"相棒、疲れてないか？
シバってヤバい敵についての
緊急会議とかで忙しいって聞いたぜ。"

"……まあ、正体もよく分かんねえし
強さもとんでもねえ敵だしな。"

"おれも、相棒を支えられるように
方針が決まるまで
ちゃんと特訓しとかないとな。"

"……相棒、おれたち
今大変なことになってるよな。"

"あのヤバい奴らにいきなり襲われて
みんな、力の限り戦ったのに
ここまでやられちまうなんて……"

"アムドゥスキアに行けばなんとかなる
保証なんて、どこにもないけど……
おれは、糸口が見つかる気がするぜ。"

"お疲れさん！\u3000相棒！
シャオも戻って来てくれたし
これでなんとかなりそうだよな！"

"改めて、おれも気合を入れないとな。
一緒に頑張ろうぜ！"

"強襲に向かった
A.I.S部隊、全滅だってな……"

"とんでもない強さだってのは
わかってたけど、いくらなんでも
強すぎだよなあ……"

"ますます、気を引き締めないとな！
おれにもできることがあったら
なんでも言ってくれよな！\u3000相棒！"

"シバの力を封じたと思ったら
正体がミトラだったなんて……
なんだかやるせないよな。"

"でも、フォトナーを
倒せたんだから、シバだって
きっと倒せるはずだよな！"

"とはいえ、無理は禁物だぞ。
怪我もしたって聞いたし
少しは休んでくれよ、相棒。"
